alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 11:21AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN PIKE AND NORTHERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EDT... At 1121 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Peebles, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Piketon, Lucasville, Beaver, Rarden, Wakefield, Stockdale, State Route 335 at State Route 776, Givens, Ladd, Mount Joy, Bear Creek, Germany and Minford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
